short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Corbey replaces any election posts on your Facebook feed. Specifically.. with corgis or Beyonce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an experimental app created via a Friday night with no plans, a need to get rid of election posts on my newsfeed, and a lot of bourbon left in my apartment. 

Simply log into your Facebook account, click the extension's icon, hit the magic button and start scrolling your election angst away. Enjoy!!

** Alpha version - bug and general feedback welcome **
